Starice::
"I arrived with MAximal commander Epyon and join this maximal group" said Starice"But a friend was kidnapped some days ago by decepticons and I don't know what happened with him...  after a battle I was wounded and I don't know what's going on by now" 
  Rudra656@... wrote: ::Whistler:: 
      "That's okay last time I was here this was a ship not a city.  I nearly died protecting their leader.  I woke up in a city.  Go figure."  He grimaced.  "Then there was a big beam that blasted the hell out of it and I flew into a tree and nearly died again."  He looks around in mock concern.  "I'm sorry, do I sound bitter?"  As if remembering something he puts his hand up.  "Oh and before both of those I was at a different ship that got blown up.  And I ended up in the bushes half dead.  But maybe I'm just a bit jaded."
